modName: Mord Sith Armor DB Armor Recolor Retexture
summary: This is a Retexture/Recolor of the Female Dark Brotherhood Armor to mimic the Mord Sith Outfits from Legend of the Seeker.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Female Mord Sith Armor DB Armor Retexture/Recolor
Version: 1.0
Date: 11/30/2011
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): HadToRegister/TR
Source: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2140

Description
===========
This is a Retexture/Recolor of the Female Dark Brotherhood Armor to mimic the Mord Sith Outfits from Legend of the Seeker.
I\'ve even done every buckle and rivet and changed them to a slight gold color.

Details
=======
This is a Retexture/Recolor of the Female Dark Brotherhood Armor to mimic the Mord Sith Outfits from Legend of the Seeker.

Install
=======
1. Extract the file to the Data folder.

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files in the textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\ folder

data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_boots.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_boots_n.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_gauntlets.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_gauntlets_n.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_hood.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_hood_n.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_torso.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\\dbarmor_female_torso_n.dds



Incompatibility
===============
This mod is incompatible with any other mod that changes the texture of the Female darl Brotherhood Armor.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None.
If the texture isn\'t working for you, you\'ve extracted it to the wrong place.

History
=======
1.0, 10/30/2011 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
HadToRegister at the nexus

Credits
=======
Thanks to Carl Sagan for bringing the Universe to all of us.
Thanks to Neil deGrasse Tyson for continuing Carl Sagan\'s work.
Thanks to George Carlin for making me laugh.
Thanks to Frank Zappa for writing good music.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
No permissions will be granted, too much of my older stuff ended up in mods I didn\'t give permission for.
author: HadToRegister TR
